metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35116 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered jackson-databind thru 2.15.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impacts via crafted object that uses cyclic dependencies. NOTE: the vendor's perspective is that the product is not intended for use with untrusted input.

notes.Note: sbeattie> attack vector of a crafted string disputed by upstream

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
